About the Company: Unjha Formulations Ltd is engaged in the manufacture of pharmaceutical formulations in the form tablet, capsule, oral liquids, injectables (SVP) and powder section to manufacture ayurvedic as well as allopathy products.They are the leading processor and exporter of Psyllium Husk & Powder in India.The product range of the company includes Fibron Powder,Fibron Sugar Free Powder and Psyllium Capsules.
